alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 9:12PM CDT until March 25 at 8:42AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. For the Black River...including Neillsville, Black River Falls, Galesville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Black River at Black River Falls. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 47.0 feet, Some rural roads may begin to flood including county Highway VV downstream near the La Crosse County line. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 47.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CDT Thursday was 48.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 38.1 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 47.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 47.0 feet on 03/30/2004. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 845 AM CDT.
